channel.title: Need help with local host
channel.description: Ok i can run my server complie my sever and i have NO-IP running but i cannot log on to my sever it says "error connecting to server" so apprently i shouldnt use NO-IP to log on i should try localhot but where do i find my local host and when i try and log on my server where should i type my localhost??? need help please reply

item.title: Need help with local host
item.dc:creator: @MrPink MrPink
item.description:
@MrPink wrote:

If localhost doesn’t work then try 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with local host
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Instead of typing your no-ip in the server ip slot, type ‘localhost’

Read full topic
